ygData.subject: Trim the reply lengths a little please
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry to request, but could you folks trim up the reply lengths a tad? Some folks are posting to the list and it s not appending a symbol infront of reply
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry to request, but could you folks trim up the reply lengths a tad? Some
folks are posting to the list and it's not appending a symbol infront of
reply sections... so it's hard to tell what's new and what's old without a
LOT of re-reading (becuase the last digest message I got was WAY longer than
it would have been with some selective reply trimming).

This would help tons, thanks all. If ya don't wanna, don't worry. Just a
request. =)

Tuni Gearspinner
45th Mage, and Gnome Extraordinare.
Karana Server
